entities.name: lucius
entities.description: Lucius Malfoy is mentioned as the one who hands over his wand to Voldemort. He is described as pale and has long blonde hair hanging down his back.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is mentioned as the one who receives Lucius' wand. He is described as having red eyes.

entities.name: malfoy's wife
entities.description: Malfoy's wife is mentioned as being pale and staring straight ahead. She has long blonde hair hanging down her back.

relationships.description: Voldemort owns Lucius' wand, which he receives from him.
Lucius gives his wand to Voldemort.
